transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Haan sir IndiaMART se bolna hai?
Customer: Haan ji. Hello?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Haan sir main carpet house se bol raha hun main.
Executive: Kahan se? Carpet house se?
Customer: Haan. Bol raha hun maine 14 January ko TrustSeal ka package liya tha, theek hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Jo TrustSeal ka package ye approve kiye the, main already 11 January ko mera paisa kat chuka tha jo basic package ka hota hai 2950 ka.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: To 14 January ko jab package liya to us din bola gaya ki aapka offer offer dikha kar
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Kuch bola gaya ki ek mahina ka aapka jo package abhi kat chuka hai paisa, wo paisa jo aapko hum TrustSeal package mein adjust kar denge, ek mahina udhar se aapka aa jayega. Theek hai? Offer offer dikha ke humko ek mahina ka pichla liye, uske baad wo TrustSeal package start kar diye, theek hai? To wo January mein payment kiya tha, January ka payment usme adjust ho gaya to ek mahina piche se chala gaya. Abhi baat bola ja raha hai ki aapka wo teen mahina ka adjust kiya hua hai pichla.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Offer ke samne mujhe offer dikhaya pichla teen mahina ka lekar mera ye kar diya, abhi bol raha hai ki 11 November ka aapka package khatam ho gaya.
Executive: Okay. Theek hai, main ek baat karta hun. Main aapko clear karna chahiye tha na ki haan sir aapko offer nahi diya ja raha hai, aap portal itna kar lo, offer samne se offer deke pichla do mahina mera ye kar liya, adjust kar liya.
Executive: Main samajh gaya sir, aapko wo jo hai previous jo issue aaya uska aap mujhe bata rahe ho na?
Customer: Haan, abhi jo mere hisab se wo hona chahiye 11 December ko mere hisab se wo complete hona chahiye package.
Executive: Achcha. Abhi Sandhya mam bolke koi hai, wo phone kiye matlab do teen din pehle hafta din pehle se kar rahi thi, wo boli 11 November ka aapka package khatam ho jayega, fir se renew kara lo. To humne theek hai karaenge abhi package limit wagera nahi hai card mein adjust. Ek main baat karta hun. To limit wagera adjust kar hi raha tha to jab maine check kiya to dekh rahe ki 11 December ko mere hisab se complete hona chahiye, wo mam bol rahi hai 11 November ka aapka khatam ho chuka hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Main ek bar wo fir main backend pe bhi confirm kar leta hun, koi issue nahi hai uske liye, theek hai? Aur aapko concern team se main aapko connection karwa deta hun. To jo call jo aayegi na aapko next, wo call pick kar lijiyega, theek hai?
Customer: Haan haan, theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai, main ek bar uske liye main check kar leta hun, aapne jo mujhe bataya wo sari details mein mention kar deta hun aur ek bar unko main backend pe confirm kar leta hun ki kya hua hai backend pe, kya details accounting mein hui hai wo confirm ek bar ho jayegi to wo samne aa jayega.
Customer: Sir main bol raha hun offer hai to dene boliye, nahi hai to koi pichla do mahina agar cancel karke offer mein ghusa dega ye kya matlab hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi, nahi nahi aisa nahi sir. Offer jo rahega to wo aapko mam communicate kar lengi, koi aisa nahi hai. But kya rehta hai na ki offer ki validity rehti hai sir, correct?
Customer: Wo offer ka nahi bol rahe sir, offer offer kuch nahi hai abhi wo baat ki baat hai, pichla wala jo hua tha TrustSeal package jab liya tha, us time humko bola gaya tha ki ek mahina ka aapka adjust hoga aur payment already ho chuka tha. Auto debit tha to ho chuka tha isliye humne ek mahina ye wala payment aapka agla mein adjust ho jayega aur ye pichla mahina se aapka ye continue ho jayega. To ek mahina adjust hua na, abhi mam bata rahi hai teen mahina ka.
Executive: To maine jaise bataya ki wo main uske liye backend pe confirm karne ki jo hai na, wo main ek bar kar leta hun, theek hai? Koi aisa issue nahi hai. Haan confirm karke call kijiye.
Executive: Wo main haan backend pe confirm kar leta hun aur jo concern team hai iske liye, jo aapka account handle kar rahe hain, jo checks karte hain, unse aapka communication karwa diya jayega, theek hai? To aapko jo next call aayegi wo jarur pick kar lijiyega, theek hai? To jo bhi discussion hoga wo aapko ho jayega.
Customer: Aur profile mein show kyun nahi karta hai sir ki matlab kab uska package end hoga? Jab TrustSeal ka package to one time payment hota hai na sir? To wo to jo bhi rehta hai wo credit card ka through EMI rehta hai EMI. Wo to IndiaMART wala EMI nahi banate hain.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai, to jab credit card ka through to one time payment ho jayega na, profile mein to aapka end package ka end date to dena chahiye na, wo to end date nahi dikh raha. Agar wo pehle dikh jata to main usi starting mein hi call karta iske regarding.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: End date to dikh nahi raha tha, abhi bhi nahi dikh raha end date package kab khatam ho raha.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Ye to show karna chahiye na sir profile mein kyunki ye continuous wala to nahi hai ki nahi dikhega. Ye to one time payment hua ek saal ka to wo start aur end date to dikhna chahiye na sir profile mein.
Customer: Tab na uske according main prepared rehta, pehle ek do mahina pehle se main prepared rehta, card ka limit wagera arrange karke rakhta. Mera hisab se to 11 December ko khatam ho raha tha, usi ke according main chal raha tha, abhi achanak se mam bol rahi thi ki matlab 11 November ko aapka khatam ho gaya. Ek mahina ka gap ho gaya idhar.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha achcha. Baat ek mahina ka nahi hai sir, ek mahina ka limit wagera bhi to arrange karna rehta hai na card ka to card ka nahi rehta na payment.
Executive: Samajh raha hun, samajh raha hun sir. To aap matlab kya wo card ka koi work hua nahi kya?
Customer: Wo hum kar lenge uske koi issue nahi hai, yahan pe ek mahina ka masala fasa hua hai wo dekhiye.
Executive: Achcha. Haan wo main wo main confirm kar leta hun. End date wo diya kijiye, end date jo rehta hai start aur end date kab khatam ho raha hai mera package, wo to mention kiya kijiye na, usi ke according main prepared rahega aadmi.
Executive: Sari jo aapko issues aa rahe hain wo main mention kar leta hun aur main aapko communicate kara deta hun, koi issue nahi, theek hai sir? Haan wo dekhiye na wo uska baad jaisa hota hai bataiye fir uska main ek do din. Haan relevant team aapko relevant team jo hai wo aapko communicate kar degi.
Customer: Haan theek hai. Aur profile mein end aur start aur end date mention kiya kijiye, either bill mein kam se kam mention kar diya kare.
Executive: Main mention kar deta hun. Main main main backend pe confirm karwata hun.
Customer: Theek theek theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Package validity not reflecting correctly in profile.

- Customer believes package should end December 11.

- Executive stated package ended November 11.

- Previous offer adjustments not clear.



Resolution:

- Executive will check backend for package details.

- Executive will connect customer with concern team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to receive a call from concern team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, package, end date, profile, offer
